responses: I am a chatbot designed to answer questions about Vanshaj Raghuvanshi. I can provide details about his education, skills, projects, experience, and socials.

Vanshaj Raghuvanshi is a Computer Science and Engineering student at Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology. He specializes in AI, ML, and software development. Ask me more to learn about his work!
Vanshaj is pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology. His current CGPA is 9.04/10.
Vanshaj has expertise in Python, Java, JavaScript, C/C++, ML/DL, OpenCV, SQL/NoSQL Databses, Vector Stores, AWS, and focusing on Generative AI.

patterns: What projects has Vanshaj worked on?
responses: Vanshaj has worked on multiple projects across AI, ML, NLP, and web development. Please visit https://vanshajraghuvanshi.me/ to see them in one place.:

patterns: Does Vanshaj have any work experience?
Tell me about Vanshaj's work experience
responses: Vanshaj has interned at Meril, a medical company; Techplement, an IT services company, and CodeClause, contributing to AI and ML development. He has also worked with the Kshitiksha Foundation and held technical leadership roles at TIET.
At Thapar, he is currently the Technical Lead at the Thapar Institue Counselling Cell, and a mental health ambassador. He has also been the technical head at Backslash Computing Society.
